title: OIDC
description:
The oidc block lets you configure the oauth2_authorization_url() function and an access
control for an OIDC Authorization Code Grant Flow redirect endpoint.
Like all access control types, the oidc block is defined in the definitions Block and can be referenced in all configuration blocks by its required label.

title: Proxy
description: The proxy block creates and executes a proxy request to a backend service.
